oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Little River Farm postcard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Little River Farm, Smith Farm. On back: Little River Farm. Smith farm. Robert & Willie, Sophronia, Sallie, Fannie?” Shows cattle, fences. Believed to be in Blount County, TN. 1 pc. RPPC (Real photo postcard).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Farms; Cattle;
